title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center: BLEACHED MAHOGANY SIDE & BASE-GRAIN UPRIGHT/REFLECTOR IN SIDE/TOP OF SIDE-ONE SIDE ETCHED GLASS/FLASHED OPAL GLASS UNDER/TWO GLASS SHELVES 1/2" THICK POL. EDGES/SHELF SUPPORT 2 1/2" DIA POL. CHROME.; inscribed in graphite circled at lower right: 8472/B; inscribed in graphite at upper margin right: 55=; inscribed dimensions, materials; inscribed on verso in graphite at lower right: 1 of each[---] & Drawing
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for end table/shelving unit. L-shaped side and base in bleached mahogany supporting two glass shelves; polished tubular chrome support at right. Reflector at top of side support.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-892.
